title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, providing a simple API to chat, generate embeddings, and pull models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama with sync/async support, streaming, and embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, enabling chat, completion, and embedding chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API, supporting chat and generation.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompt templates and shell integration.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM completions via Ollama into the editor.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with Ollama models in any server channel.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks for running Ollama with GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama generators and chat components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with fluent API and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-ts
summary: TypeScript fetch-based client for Deno and Bun with full type coverage.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift package for macOS/iOS apps to chat with Ollama models natively.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chat UI for Ollama with Markdown and code highlighting.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to generate notes and summaries using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with threaded replies and model switching.
